text: ya the stoichiometry a lot math

Like poly jc much closer to real world chemistry
I wld say I just draw out the scenario ans figure out what went in and what went out
The one taught in o levels is very simplified model
Cus the thing is for jc poly chemistry  we dont deal with the 2D flattened shape
